description: You’ll need a sharp eye and a quick mind to complete these 100 themed word search puzzles. Word Searcher 4 contains fun words from multiple categories including Fossils, Literature and Tornadoes. Packed with a huge assortment of subjects to choose from, there’s sure to be a puzzle for everyone! Help improve your vocabulary, memory and problem-solving skills with these challenging puzzles. Keep track of and try to beat your own play through times again and again as words are scrambled every time you play. Get your thinking cap on and conquer all 100 today!
name: Word Searcher 4
